name: Luftmysza
description:
Describtion:
Story about cute bat locked in dark labirynth who must eat all fireflies in order to survive. You can see labirynth by changing to the dark form, but eat only when you're in light form!
Game made during Warsaw Film School Game Jam vol. 4

Controls: 

  • Arrow Keys - move 
  • LMB - eat
  • RMB - change to dark form

Credits: 

  • Wiktoria Fruba  - Graphics
  • Mikołaj Dereszewski - Programming
